name: Murder Begone (Games Academy)
description:
Dies ist ein Projekt welche im Rahmen der Projektarbeit der Games Academy innerhalb von 8 Wochen erstellt wurde.

Overview

Team: Any Game 2

Projekttitel: Murder begone

Genre: Environmental Adventure

Perspective: FPS

Target audience: 16+

Gamemode: Singleplayer

Platforms: PC

Controls: Mouse & Keyboard

Engine: Unreal

Game Vision

Murder begone is a First Person Adventure set in an american motel. The player must cover

up foul play interacting with the world and solving puzzles in order not to be convicted.

Experience

• First person adventure (e.g. Gone Home, What Remains of Edith Finch, Blackwood Crossing)

• 1990-2000 setting in a motel (e.g. Heavy Rain)

• depressing atmosphere
